title: Scarf
description: A knitted wool scarf, generally worn for warmth. Colored red across most emoji design vendors.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the scarf emoji is a luxurious accessory, presented with a soft, flowing texture and a rich, deep burgundy color that showcases Apple's exquisite detail. Its gentle folds and realistic fabric sheen are enhanced by subtle highlights and shadows, giving it a tactile, inviting appearance. This emoji, with its warm tones and elegant drape, often signifies coziness, comfort, or a touch of fashionable flair in online conversations.
